params.multilocation: scale encoded xcm mversioned xcm message
The multilocation that we want to know to which account maps to

returns.account: The account the multilocation maps to in this chain

params.message: scale encoded xcm mversioned xcm message

xcmExecute(bytes,uint64).details: This function CANNOT be called from a smart contract

params.maxWeight: The maximum weight to be consumed
params.message: The versioned message to be executed scale encoded

params.dest: The destination chain to which send this message
params.message: The versioned message to be sent scale-encoded

getUnitsPerSecond((uint8,bytes[])).notice: Get units per second charged for a given multilocation

multilocationToAddress((uint8,bytes[])).notice: Get retrieve the account associated to a given MultiLocation

weightMessage(bytes).notice: Get the weight that a message will consume in our chain
